title: NCSC: AI to significantly boost cyber threats over next two years
description:
A report published by the UK’s National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) warns that AI will substantially increase cyber threats over the next two years.  The centre warns of a surge in ransomware attacks in particular; involving hackers deploying malicious software to encrypt a victim’s files or entire system and demanding a ransom payment for the... Read more »

The post NCSC: AI to significantly boost cyber threats over next two years appeared first on AI News.
